pullRequest.title: IGNITE-13001 .NET: Add Thin Client Compute
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add IComputeClient with ExecuteJavaTask
Add WithKeepBinary flag to compute protocol
Improve unknown pair exceptions for thin and thick clients
Add new benchmark project based on BenchmarkDotNet library
Fix cluster operation feature flags handling

commit.message: Fix feature flags for cluster group ops

nodes.bodyText: This is the only method of the class which is tested. Add at least tests for Async execution, WithKeepBinary...

+
+namespace Apache.Ignite.Core.Client.Compute
+{
+    using System;
+    using System.Threading;
+    using System.Threading.Tasks;
+
+    /// <summary>
+    /// Client Compute API. See <see cref="IIgniteClient.GetCompute"/>
+    /// and <see cref="IClientClusterGroup.GetCompute"/>.
+    /// </summary>
+    public interface IComputeClient
+    {
+        /// <summary>
+        /// Executes Java task by class name.
+        /// </summary>
+        /// <param name="taskName">Java task name.</param>
+        /// <param name="taskArg">Optional argument of task execution, can be null.</param>
+        /// <returns>Task result.</returns>
+        /// <typeparam name="TRes">Type of task result.</typeparam>
+        TRes ExecuteJavaTask<TRes>(string taskName, object taskArg);

nodes.bodyText: Can you add a more description in Doxy comment what do this test does?

nodes.bodyText: else if should be in one line (codestyle)
Perhaps it's better to change exception message now to something like 'Cluster API is not supported by the server'

commit.message: Fix JavaServer startup detection logic to avoid hangs on 2.7.x versions
Extract Java test tasks for .NET tests
Extract Java test tasks for .NET tests
Fixing "unknown pair" error message - update tests
